subject: Olympic Games (2016)
Zika Virus
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: The International Olympic Committee advised national Olympic committees on Friday to follow the World Health Organization’s guidance on dealing with the Zika virus in preparation for the Olympics in Rio de Janeiro in August.
snippet: The International Olympic Committee advised national Olympic committees on Friday to follow the World Health Organization’s guidance on dealing with the Zika virus in preparation for the Olympics in Rio de Janeiro in August.
